Original: So you accepted my request... Then I
beg of you! Please avenge my comrades!
[Page]
The three of us were searching area
[Color:5]C-1[Color:0] in the Windy Plains... I was the
only one to survive the ambush.
[Page]
I later came back in strength to slay
the monster, but it never appeared...
Though I did sense it nearby!
[Page]
I'm very sure of the location, given
that we were not the only ones who
have been attacked there.
[Page]
Whatever it is, it's both cautious
and cunning... There must be some
trick to drawing it out...
[Page]
I want you to figure it out and give
it double the pain my comrades got.
Whatever you need from me, just ask.
Translation: So you accepted my request... Then I
beg of you! Please avenge my comrades!
[Page]
The three of us were searching area
[Color:5]C-1[Color:0] in the Windy Plains... I was the
only one to survive the ambush.
[Page]
I later came back in strength to slay
the monster, but it never appeared...
Though I did sense it nearby!
[Page]
I'm very sure of the location, given
that we were not the only ones who
have been attacked there.
[Page]
Whatever it is, it's both cautious
and cunning... There must be some
trick to drawing it out...
[Page]
I want you to figure it out and give
it double the pain my comrades got.
Whatever you need from me, just ask.

Original: As I recall, the monster was on the
southern edge of area [Color:5]C-1[Color:0] in the Windy
Plains. The trick is drawing it out.
[Page]
When I was attacked, I was there with
a nightseeker and landsknecht.
[Page]
The next case was a dancer who was
alone, and after that, a landsknecht
paired with a medic.
[Page]
But when I went with a dancer, a
runemaster, a landsknecht, and a
sniper, the bastard didn't show...
[Page]
I don't get it. What's the secret...?
Translation: As I recall, the monster was on the
southern edge of area [Color:5]C-1[Color:0] in the Windy
Plains. The trick is drawing it out.
[Page]
When I was attacked, I was there with
a nightseeker and landsknecht.
[Page]
The next case was a dancer who was
alone, and after that, a landsknecht
paired with a medic.
[Page]
But when I went with a dancer, a
runemaster, a landsknecht, and a
sniper, the bastard didn't show...
[Page]
I don't get it. What's the secret...?

Original: I see... So it's dead now. I hope the
souls of those dead explorers can
find peace now...
[Page]
But that's not the only monster of
its kind. If you go back to where you
find it, you might encounter it again.
[Page]
I wonder if my comrades would be proud
if I got strong enough someday to kill
the thing on my own...
[Page]
Well, thanks for what you did. I left
your reward with Kirtida. I hope you
use it well.
Translation: I see... So it's dead now. I hope the
souls of those dead explorers can
find peace now...
[Page]
But that's not the only monster of
its kind. If you go back to where you
find it, you might encounter it again.
[Page]
I wonder if my comrades would be proud
if I got strong enough someday to kill
the thing on my own...
[Page]
Well, thanks for what you did. I left
your reward with Kirtida. I hope you
use it well.
